subtitle: The mint in this dish complements the yogurt and meat perfectly.

method.text: Blend marinade ingredients in a covered non-metallic bowl. Add lamb and marinate for 3-1 days or overnight, stirring occasionally.
Preheat grill. Grill lamb steaks for 3-5 min each side, turning once. Alternatively cook on barbecue.
Garnish steaks with the mint sprigs.

title: Greek minted lamb
